content.prompt: Paragraph 2 ("If women ... performance") states that women were

choices.label: viewed as oddities if they did not write more entertaining letters than men did
judged critically if they did not write as much correspondence as they received
regarded as responsible for the most important correspondence despite being less likely to write
considered to have a particular facility for writing letters and diary entries

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
